title: Game Scoop Episode 631
description: Welcome back to IGN Game Scoop!, the ONLY video game podcast! This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Tina Amini, Sam Claiborn, and Seth Macy -- are kicking off Game of the Year Watch 2021. Hitman 3, Resident Evil Village, Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart, Chivalry 2, and more. And, of course, they play Video Game 20 Questions. The music in this episode is from Silver Surfer on NES.
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (IGN)
